thought: The Slack send message action failed because the parameters were not set correctly. I need to set all required parameters for sending messages to the #general channel with the correct format.
plan: Set 'select' to 'channel' to specify sending to a channel
Set 'channelId' mode to 'name' and value to 'general' for the #general channel
Set 'messageType' to 'text' to send plain text messages
Set 'text' to the message content from input data
criticism: The previous call to Slack send message had empty params, causing execution failure.

tool_input.comments: Send each classification result as a text message to Slack #general channel.
